alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Highland; Hocking; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:46PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON...EASTERN BRACKEN... NORTHWESTERN LEWIS...SOUTH CENTRAL CLERMONT...SOUTHERN BROWN... ADAMS...SOUTHWESTERN HOCKING...SOUTHEASTERN PICKAWAY...PIKE... SOUTHEASTERN HIGHLAND...NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO AND EASTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EST... At 245 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Kingston to 6 miles southeast of Marshall to near Felicity, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Maysville, Georgetown, Waverly, Washington, West Union, Piketon, Manchester, Peebles, Ripley, Aberdeen, Augusta, Winchester, Seaman, Lewisburg, Lucasville, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Belfast, and Rome. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
